attributes.action: Reduce the Petrol and Diesel Prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Petrol and Diesel Prices are extremely high and MOST of it is Tax. Why should we be paying so much on fuel when it is best to find other ways of fuelling our cars and getting companies to reduce the speed for the new cars in line with our laws.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
